Cards are SOLD

Offered is this happily owned group of five (5) Sweet Caporal back T206 beaters, perfect for a low-grade set. 

Please address any questions to email, not PM: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]

$55 for the lot of five, shipping included. Payment by PayPal, friends/family: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks for looking!

Mike

Bump for price reduction, $55 for the lot of five.

Thanks for looking,
Mike

I will take them.  Please confirm nobody else beat me to it, and I will send payment.  

-kin

Thank you, Kin, and the cards are yours. Please email: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url].

Cheers,
Mike

Received my cards....extremely happy! 

Thank you! 
-kin
